column7: External hire at £35k (C) vs. experienced or founder-managed at £30–32k (R/O). Based on East England gym manager averages (£33–36k). Founder operation reduces cost and improves DSCR.
£26k each (C) for qualified CWI instructors; £24k (R) typical regional rate; £22k (O) with mixed part-time or volunteer cover. Based on ABC Climbing Jobs & UK wall benchmarks.
25–35 hrs/week coverage; £20k (C) full rota, £18k (R) leaner, £16k (O) shared role or self-check-in system (e.g., Griptonite). Matches small-wall staffing levels.
Contracted daily 7 days (C £11k), reduced 5–6 days (R £10k), or part-time shared service (O £9k). Based on UK cleaning contractor rates £10–13/hr.
20 % uplift (C/R) covers NI 13.8 %, pension 3 %, holiday/training. 17 % (O) if mostly PT or owner-operated. Based on HMRC employer cost guidance.
Year 1: 3–4 resets instead of 6, minimal spare holds; use freelance setters at ~£300/day.
Year 1: single LOLER + basic inspections; less equipment volume.
Year 1: small-scale contract or part-time cleaner; reduced bin service frequency.
New fit-out should need limited repair; keep minor contingency only.
First-year policy discounts often available; smaller insured contents pre-café.
Year 1: use basic POS + single camera system; delay CRM upgrade.
Mandatory from Day 1 but fixed low cost.
You’ll handle design and digital ads yourself; cost covers boosted posts, local PR ads, signage, and flyers.
Year 1 minimal spend: ~£200/month across Meta + Google; rely heavily on organic reach, content, and partnerships.
Use existing Squarespace/WordPress subscription and handle SEO/updates yourself.
Limited signage and posters; produce materials in-house.
Run 1–2 open days or collaborations with nearby leisure outlets; minimal spend on prizes and refreshments.
Year 1: use small local accountant for year-end + self-manage bookkeeping in Xero or QuickBooks.
Basic one-off legal review of lease, insurance and H&S templates; postpone ongoing retainers until Year 2.
First-year turnover smaller → ~1 % of ~£175 k revenue. Update automatically in model to scale with sales.
Minimal printing and admin tools; use Google Workspace or Microsoft 365 personal tier.
